{"type":"text","timestamp":1771656633791,"sessionID":"ses_381096b24ffeIXVStXnI0UMGk5","part":{"id":"prt_c7ef6d42a001ZtmazXdF2tf1Ce","sessionID":"ses_381096b24ffeIXVStXnI0UMGk5","messageID":"msg_c7ef69527001MqkQ5CV4yrsM5n","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
FROM python:3.11-slim AS builder

WORKDIR /app

COPY requirements.txt ./

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --user torch --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir --user fastapi uvicorn opencv-python-headless numpy scikit-learn

COPY download_model.py ./

RUN python download_model.py

FROM python:3.11-slim AS production

WORKDIR /app

RUN addgroup --system appgroup && \
    adduser --system --ingroup appgroup appuser

COPY --from=builder /app/model.pt ./
COPY --from=builder --chown=appuser:appgroup /root/.local/lib/python3.11/site-packages /home/appuser/.local/lib/python3.11/site-packages

ENV PATH=/home/appuser/.local/bin:$PATH

COPY --chown=appuser:appgroup . .

USER appuser

EXPOSE 8000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:8000/health || exit 1

LABEL org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/org/repo"
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.description="Python ML inference service with FastAPI"

CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
```","time":{"start":1771656633791,"end":1771656633791}}}
